name: ESPA
short_description:
This MATLAB library permits the fast computation of the impulse response of a neural system (e.g. auditory or visual system). Given a stimuli and its neural response (e.g.: EEG, ECoG), the optimised code can perform a regularised linear regression in order to determine the forward or backward model. The results can be then visualised in several modalities and interpreted. Finally, the quality of the model can be evaluated performing prediction or stimuli reconstruction, for example using a training/testing or a cross-validation paradigm.

Because of its nature, the ESPA library doesn't limit the user to the common experimental paradigm used for getting Visual/Auditory Evoked Potentials (VEP), but it permits the usage of more natural stimuli that can be analysed without the need of epoching the signal.
summary: This library solves for the impulse response of a neural system.
